WorkItem.Description: hello... after upgrading to 0.9.5 i noticed that my ts code editor window no longer shows a navigation bar at the top,,, i have double checked my settings and verified they are set to show the nav bar... i even reset my settings hoping that it would trigger the nav bar but no luck... i have attached an image of what i am seeing... any ideas????

Comments.Message: Strange. What version of VS are you using? This looks like an ASP.NET project of some sort, is that right? You installed 0.9.5 over the top of 0.9.1.1 or uninstalled 0.9.1.1 first? Trying to gather some more clues that might give us a lead on the issue. Please re-open this issue with any additional info you can provide.
